item.title: Build a Personal GitHub Blog with Hugo and LoveIt Theme
item.author: Jerry Liu CN
item.description:
Introduction

This tutorial will guide you step by step to build an efficient and modern personal blog on GitHub, covering:

  • Blog framework selection: Based on the Hugo static site generator, combined with the beautiful and powerful LoveIt theme.
  • Automated deployment: Use GitHub Actions to achieve continuous integration and automatic publishing in a dual-repo mode. No manual operation is requiredâ€”just push your code to go live automatically.
  • Search integration: Integrate Algolia for full-site content search, and use automated scripts/processes to keep the index in sync in real time, improving content retrieval experience.
  • Comment system: Enable blog comments with Giscus.

This tutorial will cover environment preparation, project structure, theme configuration, CI/CD automation, search integration, comment integration, common issues, and optimization tips, helping you quickly own a high-quality personal blog.
